caseTitle: Abdul Aziz v. Mst. Zain un Nissa & others
tagline: (1) No evidence was brought that any disinterested or  neutral person read over the gift deed to the illiterate/pardanashin ladies. (2) The burden of proof rests on the beneficiary of document to establish that the said document was executed after mindfulness of the transaction. (3) The Pardanashin ladies have been given a protection in view of social conditions that include an imperfect knowledge of the world being virtually excluded from communion with the outside world.
